data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "What are the disadvantages of being famous?"
data.answer: The most significant disadvantage of being famous is that celebrities often lack privacy. Wherever they go, they will become the focus of the crowds, which will cause troubles not only for themselves but also for their families. The other disadvantage is that they need to pay more attention to their behaviors all the time to build up a good image for the public. If there are some scandals around them, their reputation will be destroyed significantly, and they may lose the opportunities for advertisements or movies. In conclusion, when celebrities are enjoying the public's applause, they also shoulder the burden of massive focus. (103字)
